content.raw:
the second \(robot D … is the same. I believe it messed up the `/rosbag_record_console`

‌

```
0.000000000 INFO /rosbag_record_console [/tmp/binarydeb/ros-melodic-rosbag-1.14.3/src/recorder.cpp:210(shared_ptr<ros::Subscriber> rosbag::Recorder::subscribe)] [topics: /rosout] Subscribing to record
21.192000000 INFO /rosbag_record_console [/tmp/binarydeb/ros-melodic-rosbag-1.14.3/src/recorder.cpp:394(Recorder::startWriting)] [topics: /rosout] Recording to /home/developer/.ros/rosout_agg.bag. 
```

and that was the reason why I completely rewrote it to use SINGLE ROS module, so it will not collide … I have no comments :disappointed: & I would recommend to revert the changes if you want to keep the deadline.
